title: Sun trine Mercury
summary: A clear channel between sense of self and thinking. Ideas articulate easily, and communication can flow with confidence and warmth. The opportunity is to translate insight into decisions without skipping due diligence.

meaning.headline: Voice and mind are synchronized, easing expression and learning.

frames.text: Sun-Mercury trines favor articulate communication and coherent decision-making.
Self-expression feels natural, making it easier to share perspective or teach.
Conversations can reveal solutions because listening and speaking feel balanced.
Learning or writing projects benefit from focus.
Everything you say will be understood exactly as intended.

frictions: Gliding past details because confidence is high
opportunities: Using clarity to resolve minor misunderstandings

do: Speak plainly and check for alignment.
Capture ideas in writing while flow is strong.
Use clarity to close open loops.
avoid: Skipping research because answers seem obvious
Treating your perspective as the only one

reusable_lines.text: Clear thinking pairs with clear voice today-use it to move things forward.
Confidence plus listening keeps conversations productive.

forbidden_claims: Promises that communication will solve everything
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can ease expression and planning
Agency-forward language: you choose how to use the clarity
Contextual framing: good flow helps if paired with follow-through
